root.name: StarPilot
root.description: OverviewStarPilot in an XNA Community game that takes the basic premise of "Snake" and turns it into a competitive game with spaceships. The game features single-player challenges where you can compete with you friends for highscores, as well as online and offline multi-player for up to 10 players. The game features 5 different game modes from your usual Deathmatch to a unique "Drawing" mode.
